name: The River (Concept)
description:
The River, a GameJam Project. #SummerGameJam2022 #GameDevRegensburg #TeamGrößenwahn

Leaving a pompous, decadent and morally rotting city, not unlike Rome before it's fall, you take a boat, a couple of trusty followers, some tools and food to start a journey down The River. Looking for truth and your own worth you find out first hand how life works. Especially after growin up with silver and gold spoons.

Finding a landing spot you create a camp to stock up on food and other necessaries, realising what you need to do for it.
Creating a settlement you make your first experiences with organising your followers, first hand experiences with gathering and managing ressources.

Finding yourself you also quickly find the limitations of your landing spot and so you set out again downriver, looking for a better spot and on your journey creating a string of settlements alongside the river, building an economic chain of settlements to support yourself and your people, to advance and make your way down The River.
